head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DUBIN, ROBERT A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DUBIN, ROBERT A.

block.p: DUBIN--Robert A. Formerly of Seagram Company. Beloved husband of Nancy, devoted father of Adam and Jon, father-in-law of Teresa Romero, loving brother of Ellen, son-in-law of Ellie Edelstein. Passed away on April 6th, 2007. Funeral services will be Tuesday, April 10th, 11:45 am, Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th St.

DUBIN--Robert A. Formerly of Seagram Company. Beloved husband of Nancy, devoted father of Adam and Jon, father-in-law of Teresa Romero, loving brother of Ellen, son-in-law of Ellie Edelstein. Passed away on April 6th, 2007. Funeral services will be Tuesday, April 10th, 11:45 am, Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th St.
